</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns unit's knowledge about target. The returned array includes information whether the target is 
# known by group
# known by the unit
# last time the target was seen by the unit
# last time the target endangered the unit
# target side
# position error
# target position
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''targetKnowledge''' target </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] (7 elements) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allInfo = _soldierOne [[targetKnowledge]] _jeepOne;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_posError = (_soldierOne [[targetKnowledge]] _jeepOne) [[select]] 5;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[knowsAbout]], [[targetsQuery]], [[targetsAggregate]], [[nearTargets]], [[reveal]], [[getHideFrom]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
